title: Putin Says His War in Ukraine Will Continue
itunes:title: Putin Says His War in Ukraine Will Continue
description:
Bloomberg News National Security Team Leader Bill Faries reports on why stakes for both Russia and Ukraine look set to rise in their ground war following the Russian invasion. Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses the medical and humanitarian crises in Ukraine. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Assistant Managing Editor Jim Ellis explain how the $100 billion bet on 5G technology isn’t paying off. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne talks about his story China’s Fateful Choice on Ties With Russia. And we Drive to the Close with Jay Hatfield, CEO at ICAP.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
